actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy and Poultry

official_title: A bill to modify the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire, in administering the milk price support program, milk products in consumer-sized packages whenever the uncommitted stocks of such products exceed certain levels.
short_title: Surplus Milk Products Packaging Act of 1988

summary.text: Surplus Milk Products Packaging Act of 1988 - Provides for the acquisition of surplus milk products (butter, cheese, nonfat dry milk) in consumer-sized packages when uncommitted Commodity Credit Corporation-held stocks exceed specified limits. Makes such acquisition mandatory or discretionary depending upon the level of excess stocks.

titles.title: Surplus Milk Products Packaging Act of 1988

A bill to modify the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire, in administering the milk price support program, milk products in consumer-sized packages whenever the uncommitted stocks of such products exceed certain levels.
